abstract: Jumping into the are-we-aren’t-we-in-a-recession debate, JPMorgan Chase‘s chief executive, James Dimon, told a group of economists in Washington on Wednesday that the United States is likely in recession already and the housing market is expected to deteriorate further.
lead_paragraph: Jumping into the are-we-aren’t-we-in-a-recession debate, JPMorgan Chase‘s chief executive, James Dimon, told a group of economists in Washington on Wednesday that the United States is likely in recession already and the housing market is expected to deteriorate further.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Dimon Says Recession May Be Upon U.S.
